channel.title: Help me with run.bat
channel.description:
Im setting up the vps but i have a problem when i double click on run.bat the window will pop-up and close....
Im 100% i have JDK and JRE
this is what's inside the run.bat file
@echo off color 81 title Run java -Xmx500m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-6.0.16-ga-bin.jar server
Any idea?

item.title: Help me with run.bat
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

add ‘pause’ to the end of the batch file, run the batch file, and post the error in the sticky.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with run.bat
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

Im setting up the vps but i have a problem when i double click on run.bat the window will pop-up and close…

Im 100% i have JDK and JRE

this is what’s inside the run.bat file

@echo off
color 81
title Run
java -Xmx500m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-6.0.16-ga-bin.jar server

Any idea?
